remarks: Commutative/associative law for Hilbert space operator sum that swaps the second and third terms.  (Contributed by NM, 27-Jul-2006.) (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
hods.1 $e |- R : ~H --> ~H $.
hods.2 $e |- S : ~H --> ~H $.
hods.3 $e |- T : ~H --> ~H $.
hoadd32i $p |- ( ( R +op S ) +op T ) = ( ( R +op T ) +op S ) $.
